artifacts.content:
{
  "mvp_definition": {
    "core_value_proposition": "A comprehensive build monitoring and management dashboard for the OLYMPUS development team",
    "target_user": "Power users and developers who need real-time visibility into their builds",
    "key_differentiator": "Provides a single pane of glass to understand the status, progress, and risks of any OLYMPUS build"
  },
  "mvp_features": [
    {
      "id": "build_list",
      "name": "Build List Panel",
      "category": "core",
      "priority": "must_have",
      "rice_score": 95,
      "rice_breakdown": {
        "reach": 9,
        "impact": 10,
        "confidence": 10,
        "effort": 8
      },
      "description": "Displays a list of active and completed builds with status indicators, timestamps, and duration",
      "user_story": "As a developer, I want to see a list of all my builds so I can quickly check their status and progress"
    },
    {
      "id": "phase_progression",
      "name": "Phase Progression Panel",
      "category": "core",
      "priority": "must_have",
      "rice_score": 92,
      "rice_breakdown": {
        "reach": 8,
        "impact": 9,
        "confidence": 9,
        "effort": 8
      },
      "description": "Provides a visual timeline of the build phases, showing the status of each step in the process",
      "user_story": "As a product manager, I want to see the current stage of my build so I can understand where we are in the development lifecycle"
    },
    {
      "id": "agent_roster",
      "name": "Agent Roster Panel",
      "category": "core",
      "priority": "must_have",
      "rice_score": 88,
      "rice_breakdown": {
        "reach": 8,
        "impact": 8,
        "confidence": 9,
        "effort": 7
      },
      "description": "Lists all 35 agents involved in the build, showing their current status and assigned tasks",
      "user_story": "As a project manager, I want to see who is working on my build and what they're currently doing so I can ensure everything is on track"
    },
    {
      "id": "constitutional_status",
      "name": "Constitutional Status Panel",
      "category": "core",
      "priority": "must_have",
      "rice_score": 90,
      "rice_breakdown": {
        "reach": 8,
        "impact": 9,
        "confidence": 9,
        "effort": 7
      },
      "description": "Displays the status of key constitutional checks, providing a high-level view of compliance and potential issues",
      "user_story": "As a team lead, I want to know if my build is adhering to the OLYMPUS constitutional standards so I can address any problems early"
    },
    {
      "id": "understanding_panel",
      "name": "Understanding Your Build Panel",
      "category": "core",
      "priority": "must_have",
      "rice_score": 88,
      "rice_breakdown": {
        "reach": 8,
        "impact": 8,
        "confidence": 9,
        "effort": 7
      },
      "description": "Provides insights into what was built, why it was built that way, and any known risks or issues",
      "user_story": "As a developer, I want to understand the rationale behind the decisions made in my build so I can make better-informed choices in the future"
    },
    {
      "id": "contextual_chat",
      "name": "Contextual Chat Panel",
      "category": "supporting",
      "priority": "should_have",
      "rice_score": 80,
      "rice_breakdown": {
        "reach": 7,
        "impact": 7,
        "confidence": 8,
        "effort": 8
      },
      "description": "Allows users to ask questions about the current build and receive responses from the OLYMPUS AI agents",
      "user_story": "As a user, I want to be able to ask questions about my build and get immediate answers from the OLYMPUS team, so I can better understand what's happening"
    }
  ],
  "roadmap": {
    "phase_1_mvp": {
      "duration": "4-6 weeks",
      "features": [
        "build_list",
        "phase_progression",
        "agent_roster",
        "constitutional_status"
      ],
      "milestone": "Minimum Viable Product"
    },
    "phase_2_enhance": {
      "duration": "2-4 weeks",
      "features": [
        "understanding_panel"
      ],
      "milestone": "Enhanced Build Visibility"
    },
    "phase_3_scale": {
      "duration": "ongoing",
      "features": [
        "contextual_chat"
      ],
      "milestone": "Contextual Support"
    }
  },
  "technical_requirements": {
    "stack": {
      "frontend": "Next.js 14 + React 18 + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS",
      "backend": "Next.js API Routes",
      "database": "Supabase",
      "auth": "Supabase Auth"
    },
    "integrations": [
      "Lucide React for icons",
      "Server-Sent Events (SSE) for real-time updates"
    ],
    "performance": {
      "initial_load": "<2s",
      "interaction_response": "<500ms",
      "lighthouse_target": ">90"
    },
    "security": [
      "HTTPS",
      "JWT tokens for API authentication",
      "Input sanitization"
    ]
  },
  "success_criteria": {
    "launch_requirements": [
      "All critical features are fully functional",
      "No TypeScript errors or warnings",
      "Responsive design works on desktop and tablet",
      "Users can complete the primary build monitoring flow end-to-end"
    ],
    "validation_metrics": [
      "Users can access and understand key build information in <1 minute",
      "Zero critical bugs reported in the first month"
    ]
  },
  "featureChecklist": {
    "critical": [
      {
        "id": "build_list",
        "name": "Build List Panel",
        "description": "Displays a list of active and completed builds with status indicators, timestamps, and duration",
        "acceptanceCriteria": [
          "Shows a table with columns for build name, status (queued, running, completed, failed), start time, end time, and duration",
          "Status indicators use colors (green, yellow, red) to clearly communicate build health",
          "Clicking on a build row navigates to the individual build detail page",
          "No hardcoded data - fetches real build data from /api/builds endpoint",
          "Handles loading, error, and empty states gracefully"
        ],
        "assignedTo": "pixel",
        "priority": 1,
        "rice_score": 95
      },
      {
        "id": "phase_progression",
        "name": "Phase Progression Panel",
        "description": "Provides a visual timeline of the build phases, showing the status of each step in the process",
        "acceptanceCriteria": [
          "Displays a horizontal timeline with the following phases: discovery, design, architecture, frontend, backend, integration, testing, deployment",
          "Each phase shows its current status (pending, active, completed, failed) with a corresponding icon and color",
          "Clicking on a phase displays a brief explanation of what that phase entails",
          "Fetches real-time phase data from /api/builds/[buildId]/stream endpoint using SSE",
          "Handles loading, error, and empty states gracefully"
        ],
        "assignedTo": "wire",
        "priority": 2,
        "rice_score": 92
      },
      {
        "id": "agent_roster",
        "name": "Agent Roster Panel",
        "description": "Lists all 35 agents involved in the build, showing their current status and assigned tasks",
        "acceptanceCriteria": [
          "Shows a scrollable list of all 35 agents, organized by build phase",
          "Each agent card displays their name, role, current status (idle, working, completed, failed), and their current task (if working)",
          "Agent status is indicated by color (green, yellow, red)",
          "Fetches agent data from /api/ai/agents endpoint",
          "Handles loading, error, and empty states gracefully"
        ],
        "assignedTo": "pixel",
        "priority": 3,
        "rice_score": 88
      },
      {
        "id": "constitutional_status",
        "name": "Constitutional Status Panel",
        "description": "Displays the status of key constitutional checks, providing a high-level view of compliance and potential issues",
        "acceptanceCriteria": [
          "Shows a compact panel with up to 7 constitutional checks",
          "Each check displays the article name, status (compliant, warning, violation), and a brief explanation",
          "Status is indicated by color (green, yellow, red)",
          "Fetches constitutional check data from /api/builds/[buildId] endpoint",
          "Handles loading, error, and empty states gracefully"
        ],
        "assignedTo": "pixel",
        "priority": 4,
        "rice_score": 90
      },
      {
        "id": "understanding_panel",
        "name": "Understanding Your Build Panel",
        "description": "Provides insights into what was built, why it was built that way, and any known risks or issues",
        "acceptanceCriteria": [
          "Displays three sections: 'What was built', 'Why it was built this way', and 'Known risks'",
          "'What was built' lists the generated components and files",
          "'Why it was built this way' explains the key decisions and rationale behind them",
          "'Known risks' outlines any identified issues or potential problems with mitigation status",
          "Fetches data from /api/builds/[buildId] endpoint",
          "Handles loading, error, and empty states gracefully"
        ],
        "assignedTo": "pixel",
        "priority": 5,
        "rice_score": 88
      }
    ],
    "important": [
      {
        "id": "contextual_chat",
        "name": "Contextual Chat Panel",
        "description": "Allows users to ask questions about the current build and receive responses from the OLYMPUS AI agents",
        "acceptanceCriteria": [
          "Displays as a collapsible side panel, only active when a build is selected",
          "Provides a chat interface with a text input and message history",
          "Sends user questions to the /api/ai/chat endpoint and displays the responses",
          "Handles loading, error, and empty states gracefully",
          "Maintains context about the current build to provide relevant answers"
        ],
        "assignedTo": "wire",
        "priority": 6,
        "rice_score": 80
      }
    ],
    "niceToHave": []
  },
  "risks": [
    {
      "risk": "Integrating with the real-time build data and agent status APIs",
      "probability": "medium",
      "impact": "high",
      "mitigation": "Thoroughly test the API integrations and handle all possible error states. Implement robust error handling and fallback mechanisms."
    },
    {
      "risk": "Ensuring the dashboard is highly performant and responsive",
      "probability": "medium",
      "impact": "high",
      "mitigation": "Optimize the UI components, leverage server-side rendering and streaming where possible, and continuously monitor performance metrics."
    },
    {
      "risk": "Providing a clear and intuitive user experience",
      "probability": "low",
      "impact": "high",
      "mitigation": "Conduct user testing throughout the development process, gather feedback, and iterate on the design and interaction patterns."
    }
  ]
}

decisions.reasoning: The OLYMPUS Builder Dashboard is a focused MVP targeting power users with a clear interface and specific functionalities. A monolithic architecture simplifies deployment and management given the project's current scope.
